#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int main()
{

    int n,t,p;
    char a[5];
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d %s %d",&n,&a,&p);
        if(!strcmp(a,"even"))
        {
            printf("%d\n",2*p-1);
        }
        else
            printf("%d\n",2*p);
    }
    return 0;
}
